turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'm trying to order three pizzas from Bella Luna. Three medium pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what type of pizzas are you looking to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One I just want all medium sized pepperoni, the other one I want supreme, and then the third one I want to be chicken barbecue.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And I want all of them to have a thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so to confirm, you want 3 medium pizzas, 1 with pepperoni, 1 supreme, and the 3rd being chicken bbq, all with thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total will be $42.99 would you like to purchase now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it. the pizzas will be ready in 15 minutes for pick up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright. Thank you very much. Mhm. Bye.
